Founded in 2016 by pharmacist Christina Procaccianti, Green Line Apothecary is a fast-growing, independently-owned healthcare company that combines the nostalgic personalized service of vintage drugstores with the efficiency of modern pharmacy. Offering statewide prescription services from two retail locations in Rhode Island, Green Line is redefining the pharmacy experience with a return to the practice's roots.

The old-fashioned elegance of its brick-and-mortar stores - complete with vintage soda fountains and curated health & wellness product section - goes hand-in-hand with the full-service pharmacy's robust delivery infrastructure. Whether it is a sip of a hand-crafted soda or a medication delivered to your doorstep, Green Line has got just what the doctor ordered.

About Green Line Apothecary
With locations on Main Street in Wakefield and North Main Street in Providence, Green Line Apothecary is an independently owned & operated pharmacy and soda fountain inspired by the vintage apothecary. Its full-service pharmacy fills prescriptions and accepts insurance. Its selection of health, wellness & beauty essentials includes many natural, homeopathic and locally-made products. Its authentic soda fountain serves all-natural, made-to-order soda, ice cream, shakes & floats, coffee & tea, and more.
